mapper.select: select h.rn, h.replyNo, h.userNo, h.replyContent, h.shareNo, h.id, to_char(h.regDate,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분"') regDate, h.hit, h.liked from (select s.rn, s.replyNo, s.userNo, s.replyContent, p.shareNo, p.id, p.regDate, p.hit, p.liked from (select rownum rn, r.replyNo, r.userNo, r.replyContent from (select replyNo, userNo, replyContent from reply_petagram order by replyNo asc)r )s, share_petagram p where p.shareNo = #{shareNo})h where h.rn > 0 and h.rn < 8 order by h.rn desc
